snippet: Gov. Sam Brownback has rescinded a former governor’s order barring discrimination against gays and lesbians in hiring and employment throughout much of state government.
abstract: Kansas Gov Sam Brownback rescinds former Gov Kathleen Sebelius's 2007 order banning discrimination against gays and lesbians in state hiring and employment; charges that Sebelius acted unilaterally in passing measure.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Sam Brownback has rescinded a former governor’s order barring discrimination against gays and lesbians in hiring and employment throughout much of state government.

headline.main: Kansas: Governor Rescinds Order Protecting Gay State Workers
headline.print_headline: Kansas: Governor Rescinds Order Protecting Gay State Workers
